title: House of Sand
writer: Elena Soarez (screenplay), Luiz Carlos Barreto (story), Elena Soarez (story), Andrucha Waddington (story)
actors: Fernanda Montenegro, Fernanda Torres, Ruy Guerra, Seu Jorge
plot: Áurea arrives at a town in the dunes of State of Maranhão, Brazil, in 1910, having for female company only her mother Maria. She is pregnant and wants a way out of that arid place. But leaving is difficult and, somehow, she still hopes to find happiness there. The film follows these two lives for three generations, including Áurea's daughter.
